mission_data.playerShipNames_arme: TSN Sabre\TSN Valiant\TSN Lancer\TSN Stalker\TSN Viper\TSN Horizon\TSN Necessity\TSN Hunter

set_ship_text.name: DS 903
set_ship_text.desc: Primary gatekeeper for traffic to/from Mria, especially neutrals. Station Commander has a general distrust of neutrals.

set_ship_text.name: Tibur Prime
set_ship_text.desc: Ocean world. Water world, 50,000 islands; heavy fishing and tourism; peaceful unified republic. Friendly, open culture; loves gambling, haggling, and general trading.

set_ship_text.name: Tibur Mall
set_ship_text.desc: Primary market for planet exports and general trade.

set_ship_text.name: Alders Council
set_ship_text.desc: Seat of administration for Tibur sector.

set_ship_text.name: Astral Agora
set_ship_text.desc: Ancient and sacred diplomatic facility. A demilitarized zone (DMZ) is set up around it.

set_ship_text.name: Tibur Command
set_ship_text.desc: Recently constructed due to the war efforts. Commandant is young but brilliant, clearly ambitious

set_ship_text.name: DS-59
set_ship_text.desc: Previously the command base for Tibur system. Base commander got the post just before Tibur Command was announced and built; highly resentful and petty

set_ship_text.name: Grand Emporium
set_ship_text.desc: Biggest trading post for Tibur sector, benefits from its strategic central location. Home to 100,000, mostly small shopkeeps. Recently beefed with TSN marines. Station Chief loves visitors of any kind, extremely friendly (because she gets rich from them)

set_ship_text.name: Interstellar Spas
set_ship_text.desc: Primary marketplace for traffic to/from Atilia. Regional get-away for rich and famous. Station Chief is arrogant and snobby, disdains the TSN.

set_ship_text.name: DS 777
set_ship_text.desc: Primary gatekeeper for traffic to/from Mria, especially neutrals. Station commander has an odd affections for xenos, rumored to be into doing unspecified weird stuff with them.
